title: The Swain visual rework looks V Boring AF
body: The new Swain rework, the visual portion of this update looks so generic, he looks like Draco Malfoy's dad from Harry Potter. Come on Riot, you're better than this.

replies.body: They said they not gonna change it

dunno why. the splash modification that the swain subreddit made didn't make him look like a generic general. Made him look wizened, age was creeping on him but he still has the strength to push forwards. If we hope hard enough, maybe someone will notice high up and sue them for "copyright" of lucius malfoy. Then they gotta change it.
Yeah Vlad fucked malfoy and this is the kid.
I think his ult looks very cool...
